examples: the prisoner’s repeated denials of the charges against him
las reiteradas negaciones del preso de los cargos en su contra
The terrorists issued a denial of responsibility for the attack.
Los terroristas negaron su responsabilidad por el ataque.
There was an official denial that there would be an election before the end of the year.
Hubo una negación oficial de que habría elecciones antes de fin de año.
She shook her head in denial.
